resources.string: Expected missed poses per hour by the server. If too small can dramatically increase latency. When the server misses a pose the image on the headset is updated but the position of the head and controllers of the previous frame is used.

Expected missed frames per hour by the client. If too small can dramatically increase latency. When the client misses a frame the image on the headset not updated, however the Time Warp corrects the image for head rotation.
Mean number of seconds worth of latency samples used to calculate target presentation latency on server. If unset this is calculated with expected_missed_poses_per_hour.
Mean number of seconds worth of latency samples used to calculate target presentation latency on client. If unset this is calculated with expected_missed_frames_per_hour.
Fraction of frame size relative to client default resolution.
